attributes.action: The DVLA to stop allowing people to book tests and move theory tests forward
attributes.additional_details: I would like them to stop allowing people to book tests who haven’t been waiting and prioritise those that have been waiting a long time! I would also like them to move theory tests forward due not being prioritised to do their practical driving tests.
attributes.background: I would like them to stop allowing people to book tests who haven’t been waiting and prioritise those that have been waiting a long time! I would also like them to move theory tests forward due not being prioritised to do their practical driving tests.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565349
